name: create spheroid
desc: The create_spheroid module produces a 2D or 3D spheroid.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Spheroid Type
properties.desc: The Spheroid Type allows the user to create either a 2D circle or a 3D sphere.

properties.name: Subdivisions
properties.desc: The Subdivisions control allows the user to change the number of divisions used to create the sphere or circle.  The greater the number the smoother the output appears.

properties.name: Grid Rotation
properties.desc: The Grid Rotation allows you to rotate the sphere about its center point by a set Azimuth and Inclination.

properties.name: Center Point
properties.desc: The Center Point is the location of the center of the spheroid. It is also used as a center of rotation for the spheroid.

properties.name: I Size
properties.desc: The I Size value controls the size of the sphere in the x direction before rotation.

properties.name: J Size
properties.desc: The I Size value controls the size of the sphere in the y direction before rotation.

properties.name: K Size
properties.desc: The I Size value controls the size of the sphere in the z direction before rotation.
